text:
Listen to Riffat Zamurad, Ordinand at the Diocese of Leicester, speaking in Urdu about the #COVID19 #vaccine. 

Please share with our #Urdu speaking communities.  

When it’s your turn, make sure you get your vaccine and protect yourself and others.  

#LetsBeatCovidLLR. https://t.co/6bUbBJkpJm
